name: Reset Tenant
description: Resets the tenant by removing users and their content

name: Remove Data Files
description: Removes any unauthorized data files every hour

name: Recall Applications
description: Recalls applications from users personal spaces that match the name of the application in the staged space with the recall tag

name: Manually Distribute App
description: Uses a trigger to distribute apps with the tag of distribute to users personal spaces.  Only required if some users have logged in prior to the tag being used

name: Auto-Distribute App
description: Distributes apps with the distribute tag to users as they log into the tenant

name: Auto Assign
description: Assigns users the appropriate roles as they log into the tenant
